mapper.select: SELECT ITSD12.CODE_NO, BM.MAT_CODE, BM.MAT_NAME, BM.LIFE_SALVAGE ,ITSD1.CREATE_DATE FROM INV_TOOL_SCRAP_DETAIL ITSD1, CJMADMIN.INV_TOOL_SPLIT_DETAIL ITSD12, CJMADMIN.BASE_MATERIAL BM WHERE ITSD12.id= ITSD1.SPLIT_ID AND ITSD1.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN to_date(#{startTime} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{startTime} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') + 1 AND BM.MAT_TYPE ='1f9107c5e4ba44948159211a49cc1da0' AND ITSD12.MAT_ID =BM.ID
